title: Jive Records
summary: Jive Records was an American independent record label founded by Clive Calder in 1981 as a subsidiary to the Zomba Group. Formerly headquartered in New York City, Jive was best known for its string of successes with hip hop artists in the 1980s and 1990s, along with teen pop and boy bands during the late 1990s and early 2000s.
